column5: /dd232/mikethepike1965/IMG_0520_1.jpg[/img]       Well its been an Ok year and I added a new species to my list.   My first ever lake trout caught in April.        Last time I ever fished beside Sonny May 2009.You will be missed my friend.                  Percher's prize catch.                     Ah my favorite take a young lad fishing never caught a pike in his life and he lands an 8 pounder. He also caught five pike that day.                  Well thats all until the hard water season.  MTP
Looks like a great year to me!
Ok is an understatement. Great stuff. I hope there wasn`t a foot in that shoe!
Nice recap Mike, your boy did indeed have a great year!
Great year Mike...  Doesn't look like that broken arm slowed your son down one bit.  Cheers  Craig
Great year end review and pics Mike Your son certainly got into some beauties    Congratulations to both of you Loved the pics of the big eyes Thanks for sharing Jacques
Looks like a great season to me. Good job on taking the kids out. Im sure they will always have fond memories from this summer! May you be just as successfull on the hard water this year.
Some great pics Mike, congrats to you and your son.
Looks like you guys had a fantastic year of fishing.
Great report & a nice variety of species Richard
Great recap Mike...sums your season up perfectly...AWESOME,  man those are some chunky funky walleye...relly nice.  thanks for posting.  do you ice fish?
Yes Simon I do ice fish just not enough.  MTP
